appDescription.message: Access a SFTP server directly from the Files app.

mount.description: Label for a button that triggers the mount action.

favorite.description: Label for a button to which triggers to save mount as favorite.

mountSuccess.description: Popup notifcation that informs the user that the system successfully mounted a new instance with the credentials they provided.

mountDeclined.description: Popup notification that the connection has been aborted.

mountFail.description: Popup notifcation that informs the user that the system failed to mount a new instance with the credentials they provided.

mountFailTimeout.message: Attempt has timed out. Please verify internet connection.
mountFailTimeout.description: Notification to inform that mounting has failed due to connection timeout.

mountFailInternalError.message: An internal error occurred. Please update the application.
mountFailInternalError.description: Notification of an error, which should not may appear (if all modules are working).

mountFailAlreadyMounted.description: Notification of error, in case the share is already mounted.

serverName.description: The server's host name or IP address

serverNameDescription.message: IP address or host name of server (e.g. 192.168.2.1)
serverNameDescription.description: Description of the server name form field.

mountPath.description: Path at the server which will be mounted as root.

mountPathDescription.message: Location of shared directory relative to the server
mountPathDescription.description: Description of mount path form field.

displayName.description: Name of share as shown in the Files app in ChromeOS.

displayNameDescription.message: Name of share as displayed in Files
displayNameDescription.description: Description of display name form field.

authType.description: Title of the authention type select form.

authTypeDescription.description: Descriptoin of the authentication type select form.

noFavorites.description: Description to inform the user that there are no favorites saved.

storeCredentials.description: Form field to select whether to store credentials are not.

decline.description: Label of button to decline dialog.

confirm.description: Label of button to confirm dialog

confirmServerAuthenticityDescription.message: Please confirm the authenticity of the host by manually verifying the fingerprint. Press __Confirm__ to add the host to the list of trusted hosts and establish the connection. Hit __Decline__ in case of a fingerprint mismatch.
confirmServerAuthenticityDescription.description: Dialog message in case the fingerprint of host is unknown.

verifyServerAuthenticityDescription.message: The host key of the server differs from cache. This means that either the administrator has changed the host key, or a malicious computer pretends to be the server. Please verify whether the host key has actually been changed, before proceeding. Hit __Decline__ if your are not sure.
verifyServerAuthenticityDescription.description: Dialog message in case the fingerprint of host mismatches with cache.

host.description: Title of the server host, used in details of the dialog.

algorithm.description: Title of the fingerprint algorithm, used in details of the dialog.

fingerprint.description: Title of the fingerprint key itself, utsed in details of the dialog.
